code: import{useState}from'react';import styles from'./Menu.module.css';import Terminal from'../Terminal/Terminal';import CommandDashboard from"../CommandDashboard/CommandDashboard";import AddCommand from"../Add/AddCommand/AddCommand";import useGetCommands from"../../dataAccess/useGetCommands";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Menu=()=>{const commands=useGetCommands();const[activeTab,setActiveTab]=useState('terminal');return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.menuContainer,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.navbar,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:activeTab==='terminal'?styles.active:'',onClick:()=>setActiveTab('terminal'),children:"Terminal"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:activeTab==='commands'?styles.active:'',onClick:()=>setActiveTab('commands'),children:"Commands"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:activeTab==='add'?styles.active:'',onClick:()=>setActiveTab('add'),children:"Add"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.content,children:[activeTab==='terminal'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Terminal,{commands:commands}),activeTab==='commands'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CommandDashboard,{commands:commands}),activeTab==='add'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AddCommand,{})]})]});};export default Menu;
